title: Ticket #3074: Funky argument parsing in DaemonCore
description:
The argument parsing in daemoncore is a bit antiquated. It should be made consistent with the rest of Condor.

For example, any argument starting with "-pi" is assumed to be the pidfile. Any thing else starting with "-p" is assumed to be the port. So the argument "-problem" is assumed to specify the port.

This is not very future proof, and can encourage incorrect behavior.
